query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ideas (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  idea_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  idea_description TEXT NOT NULL,
  sector VARCHAR(100),
  category VARCHAR(100),
  stage VARCHAR(50),
  technical_needs TEXT,
  financial_needs TEXT,
  target_market TEXT,
  competitive_advantage TEXT,
  evaluation_status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'pending',
  evaluation_summary TEXT,
  strengths TEXT,
  weaknesses TEXT,
  risks TEXT,
  feasibility_opinion TEXT,
  strategic_analysis TEXT,
  financial_analysis TEXT,
  market_analysis TEXT,
  execution_analysis TEXT,
  growth_strategy TEXT,
  overall_score DECIMAL(5,2),
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_user (user_id),
  INDEX idx_status (evaluation_status),
  INDEX idx_created (created_at)
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3GBEQsMxKetHhYw.15ec670fd271 --database VRAozaC7wZxCFU6SoJ8XBX --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ideas (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  idea_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  idea_description TEXT NOT NULL,
  sector VARCHAR(100),
  category VARCHAR(100),
  stage VARCHAR(50),
  technical_needs TEXT,
  financial_needs TEXT,
  target_market TEXT,
  competitive_advantage TEXT,
  evaluation_status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'pending',
  evaluation_summary TEXT,
  strengths TEXT,
  weaknesses TEXT,
  risks TEXT,
  feasibility_opinion TEXT,
  strategic_analysis TEXT,
  financial_analysis TEXT,
  market_analysis TEXT,
  execution_analysis TEXT,
  growth_strategy TEXT,
  overall_score DECIMAL(5,2),
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_user (user_id),
  INDEX idx_status (evaluation_status),
  INDEX idx_created (created_at)
);
